m_szDocSumamry: Published on July 4th, 2014 | by Christopher DeMorro Video: The Toyota i-Road Looks Fun As Hell July 4th, 2014 by Christopher DeMorro   There have been long-standing concerns that high fuel costs could one day force everybody into driving tiny pod cars instead of the hulking SUVs and pickups America enduringly loves. If the tiny pod cars of the future end up anything like the Toyota i-Road, you can sign me up right now, because it looks fun as hell.
